t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Amazon DSP: Advertise with a demand-side platform | Amazon Ads
s: Amazon DSP is a demand-side platform that programmatically buys ads to reach new and existing audiences on Amazon and third-party apps and websites.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store

t: I don’t sell on Amazon. Can I still use Amazon DSP?
Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: Using the Amazon.com name or branding elements can help you get results. Learn more about our brand use guidelines.

t: Advertisers can programmatically advertise on physical store digital signage | Amazon Ads
s: October 26, 2022 - Brands can plan their campaigns using contextual signals within Amazon physical stores such as position in the store, store location, nearby categories, and daypart.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Launch your brand with Amazon.in
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits.

t: Out-of-home: OOH advertising solutions | Amazon Ads
s: Out-of-home (OOH) advertising, sometimes called outdoor advertising, can help you grow awareness, engagement, and consideration for your brand.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - Amazon DSP introduces Brand+ and Performance+: AI-powered tools that simplify campaign management and optimize for your goals.

t: Amazon Ads: Online advertising for businesses of all sizes
s: Grow your business and increase sales with online advertising solutions that help you find, attract, and engage customers on and off Amazon.

t: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store | CPSC.gov
s: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: Amazon IP Accelerator connects you with a network of vetted legal service providers that offer trademark support and other intellectual-property services.

t: Amazon.com: Our Brands: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry
s: Online shopping for Our Brands from a great selection at Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry Store.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Create AI-optimized TV advertising campaigns with Brand+ | Amazon Ads
s: January 27, 2025 - Amazon Ads has introduced Brand+, a new AI-driven capability that helps brands reach more customers through streaming TV and online video advertising campaigns.

t: Why it's wise for Amazon to jump into DOOH | Digital Signage Today
s: June 28, 2023 - Retail giant Amazon plans to jump into the digital-out-of-home marketplace. Peter Bordes, from AI platform company Alfi, talks about how Amazon and other brands can leverage DOOH, offering shoppers the best retail experience.

t: Calzedonia launched swimwear collection on Amazon just in time for summer | Fox News
s: 1 week ago - Calzedonia just launched a swimwear collection on Amazon featuring unique, colorful one-pieces, bikinis and cover-ups that are great for the beach or pool.

t: Amazon expands in-store advertising with digital signage in grocery stores
s: July 23, 2024 - Amazon launches DOOH ads in Whole Foods and Amazon Fresh, offering new ways for brands to reach in-store shoppers.

t: Stores
s: Build a multi-page website on Amazon for your brand. Drive shoppers to your Store with ads on Amazon and marketing activities outside of Amazon using a unique, human-readable URL.
